title: Community Tools

home.heading: Meet everyone in your community
home.value: Our tools can help you finding who you'll want to talk to, browsing by job title, skillset or industry.

features.heading: All you need to activate your community
features.firstExplanation: A digital roster of people and teams for your company or community.
features.secondExplanation: Find the help you need browsing people by skill or company.
features.thirdExplanation: All the knowledge of your organization accessible from one place.

discover.heading: Never forget a name again
discover.explanation:
Every member of your company or community, with their face, name and what they do, in the same place.
You won't need to check LinkedIn or old mails to say "good morning" anymore.

connect.heading: Intelligent connections, not random
connect.explanation: Stop wasting your time looking for the best conection. Put the data to work for you: we generate personalized recommendations.

automate.heading: Stop asking your space manager
automate.explanation: Transform the information silos into shared knowledge, organised and easy to browse.

cookiePolicy.text: ¡Hi! To build better products for you, we use our own cookies as well as 3rd parties

cta2: Take your community to the next level. Create your free account today.
